meanings.definition: The quality of acting or reacting without forethought or consideration.
meanings.sent1: Her impulsivenesses often led her to make hasty decisions.
meanings.sent2: His impulsivenesses sometimes got him into trouble.
meanings.sent3: The impulsivenesses of the puppy made everyone laugh as it chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The impulsivenesses of the storm caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The impulsivenesses of the child were evident in the way he jumped from one activity to another.

meanings.definition: The tendency to act on sudden urges or desires.
meanings.sent1: The impulsivenesses of buying things on sale without needing them left her with a cluttered house.
meanings.sent2: His impulsivenesses often led to spontaneous adventures.
meanings.sent3: The impulsivenesses of eating ice cream for dinner made her feel like a rebel.
meanings.sent4: The impulsivenesses of the river's flow mirrored his unpredictable decisions.
meanings.sent5: The impulsivenesses of the cat chasing after a laser pointer entertained the whole family.
